snippet: Experts said the jury selection process for the trial of James E. Holmes, who is accused of killing 12 people in a 2012 shooting spree at a movie theater, was among the largest and most complicated in United States history.
abstract: Jury is chosen in trial of James E Holmes, who carried out shooting rampage in Aurora, Colo, movie theater in July 2012, killing 12 people and injuring 70; Holmes has pleaded not guilty due to insanity.
lead_paragraph: Experts said the jury selection process for the trial of James E. Holmes, who is accused of killing 12 people in a 2012 shooting spree at a movie theater, was among the largest and most complicated in United States history.

headline.main: Jury Chosen in Rampage at Multiplex in Colorado
headline.print_headline: Jury Chosen in Rampage at Multiplex in Colorado
